page.title: 18The St.Helens Show
page.content: In 1968 St.Helens celebrated its centenary by holding a three day show. It was a success and has become an annual event held in the large open spaces of Sherdley Park. Many different events take place at the same time.In 1985 they include a stunt flying team,jazz bands,clay pigeon shooting,competitions for craftwork,horticulture and fur and feather.Local firms display their products together with national and international companies in a large exhibition tent.There is a small charge to go inside the tent itself. A large outside arena is set out and crowds of people watch displays by mainly the armed forces.These include parachute jumping and motorcycle displays. It is an enjoyable time,especially as the admission is free.
